A

AbstractProcess - Class in com.codecool.shop.order.orderProcesses
This is an Abstract class for Order processes The goal of this abstract class is to log the start and the finish of concrete process class calls without duplicating code.
AbstractProcess(Order) - Constructor for class com.codecool.shop.order.orderProcesses.AbstractProcess
Abstract constructor for processes
